00002  *******************************************************
00003  *              ALLPASS FILTER
00004  *******************************************************

00010 // Check against redundant including
00011 #ifndef TT_ALLPASS_H
00012 #define TT_ALLPASS_H
00013 
00014 // Include appropriate headers
00015 #include "tt_audio_base.h"
00016 
00017 
00018 /********************************************************
00019         CLASS INTERFACE/IMPLEMENTATION
00020 
00021         The entire class is implemented inline for speed.
00022  ********************************************************/
00023 
00024 class tt_allpass:public tt_audio_base{
00025 
00026         private:
00027                 tt_attribute_value      delay_ms;                                       // ATTRIBUTE: Delay time in milliseconds
00028                 tt_attribute_value      gain;                                           // ATTRIBUTE: Gain coefficient
00029                 tt_sample_vector        ff_buffer, fb_buffer;           // buffers for the delays
00030                 tt_sample_vector        ff_end_ptr, fb_end_ptr;         // pointers to the buffer ends
00031                 tt_sample_vector        ff_in_ptr, fb_in_ptr;           // write pointers
00032                 tt_sample_vector        ff_out_ptr, fb_out_ptr;         // read pointers
00033                 long                            delay_samples_max;                      // size of the delay buffers
00034                 float                           delay_ms_max;                           // ...
00035                 long                            delay_samples;                          // Delay time in samples (internal)     
00036                 
00037         
00038         public:
00039                 enum selectors{                                                                 // Attribute Selectors                          
00040                         k_delay_ms,
00041                         k_gain
00042                 };
00043                 
00044 
00045                 // OBJECT LIFE
00046                 tt_allpass(tt_attribute_value milliseconds)     // Constructor
00047                 {
00048                         ff_in_ptr = ff_out_ptr = ff_end_ptr = ff_buffer = 0;
00049                         fb_in_ptr = fb_out_ptr = fb_end_ptr = fb_buffer = 0;
00050                         delay_ms_max = delay_samples = delay_samples_max = 0;
00051                         init(milliseconds);
00052                         set_attr(k_delay_ms, 0.0);
00053                         set_attr(k_gain, 0.0);
00054                 }
00055 
00056                 ~tt_allpass()                                                                   // Destructor
00057                 {
00058                         mem_free(ff_buffer);
00059                         mem_free(fb_buffer);
00060                 }
00061 
00062 
00063                 // ATTRIBUTES
00064                 void set_attr(tt_selector sel, tt_attribute_value val)  // Set Attributes
00065                 {
00066                         switch (sel){                   
00067                                 case k_delay_ms:
00068                                         delay_ms = clip(val, float(0.0), delay_ms_max);
00069                                         delay_samples = long(delay_ms * (sr / 1000.0));
00070                                         ff_end_ptr = ff_buffer + delay_samples;
00071                                         fb_end_ptr = fb_buffer + delay_samples; 
00072                                         break;
00073                                 case k_gain:
00074                                         gain = val;
00075                                         break;
00076                         }
00077                 }
00078 
00079                 tt_attribute_value get_attr(tt_selector sel)                            // Get Attributes
00080                 {
00081                         switch (sel){
00082                                 case k_delay_ms:
00083                                         return delay_ms;
00084                                 case k_gain:
00085                                         return gain;
00086                                 default:
00087                                         return 0.0;
00088                         }
00089                 }
00090                 
00091                 
00092                 // DSP LOOP
00093                 void dsp_vector_calc(tt_audio_signal *in, tt_audio_signal *out)
00094                 {
00095                         tt_sample_value temp;
00096                         temp_vs = in->vectorsize;
00097                         
00098                         while(temp_vs--){
00099                                 temp = anti_denormal(*in->vector++);    // Input        
00100                                 *ff_in_ptr = temp;              // Store the input in the feedforward buffer
00101                                         
00102                                 // Apply the filter
00103                                 temp = anti_denormal((*ff_out_ptr) + (temp * (-gain)) + (*fb_out_ptr * gain));  
00104                                 
00105                                 *fb_in_ptr = temp;              // Store the output in the feedback buffer
00106                                 *out->vector++ = temp;  // Output
00107                                 
00108                                 // Move the heads
00109                                 ff_in_ptr++;
00110                                 ff_out_ptr++;
00111                                 fb_in_ptr++;
00112                                 fb_out_ptr++;
00113                                 
00114                                 // Wrap the heads
00115                                 if(ff_in_ptr > ff_end_ptr)
00116                                         ff_in_ptr = ff_buffer;
00117                                 if(ff_out_ptr > ff_end_ptr)
00118                                         ff_out_ptr = ff_buffer; 
00119                                 if(fb_in_ptr > fb_end_ptr)
00120                                         fb_in_ptr = fb_buffer;
00121                                 if(fb_out_ptr > fb_end_ptr)
00122                                         fb_out_ptr = fb_buffer; 
00123                         }
00124                         in->reset(); out->reset();
00125                 }
00126                 
00127 
00128                 // INIT
00129                 void init(tt_attribute_value milliseconds)
00130                 {
00131                         delay_ms_max = milliseconds;
00132                         delay_samples_max = long(delay_ms_max * (sr / 1000.0));
00133                         mem_free(ff_buffer);
00134                         mem_free(fb_buffer);
00135                         ff_buffer = (tt_sample_value *)mem_alloc(delay_samples_max * sizeof(tt_sample_value));
00136                         fb_buffer = (tt_sample_value *)mem_alloc(delay_samples_max * sizeof(tt_sample_value));
00137                         if((ff_buffer == NULL) || (fb_buffer == NULL))
00138                                 error("tt_allpass could not allocate buffers!");
00139                         
00140                         clear();
00141                 }
00142 
00143 
00144                 // clear
00145                 void clear()
00146                 {
00147                         short i;                        
00148                         for(i=0; i < delay_samples_max; i++){
00149                                 ff_buffer[i] = 0.0;
00150                                 fb_buffer[i] = 0.0;
00151                         }
00152                         ff_in_ptr = ff_buffer;
00153                         ff_end_ptr = ff_buffer + delay_samples;
00154                         ff_out_ptr = ff_in_ptr - delay_samples;
00155                         if(ff_out_ptr < ff_buffer)
00156                                 ff_out_ptr = ff_end_ptr + (ff_out_ptr - ff_buffer) + 1;
00157 
00158                         fb_in_ptr = fb_buffer;
00159                         fb_end_ptr = fb_buffer + delay_samples;
00160                         fb_out_ptr = fb_in_ptr - delay_samples;
00161                         if(fb_out_ptr < fb_buffer)
00162                                 fb_out_ptr = fb_end_ptr + (fb_out_ptr - fb_buffer) + 1;
00163                 }
00164 
00165                 // set sample-rate (override the inherited method)
00166                 void set_sr(int value)
00167                 {
00168                         sr = value;
00169                         r_sr = 1.0 / value;
00170                         m_sr = sr * 0.001;
00171                         
00172                         init(delay_ms_max);                             // re-alloc memory
00173                         set_attr(k_delay_ms, delay_ms);
00174                 }
00175 };
00176 
00177 
00178 #endif  // tt_ALLPASS_H
